nio.base
Interface IBufferFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
BufferAutoRegisteringFactory
public interface IBufferFactory

Trieda, ktora vytvara buffre a hned ich zaregistruje. Tzv mame pristup k vsetkym buffrom.

Author:
Lukas Sekerak
